name: X GF
description: What is the project about? x GF is a Telegram bot on which you could talk to Evie, an AI, through voice and video messages. Evie is trained to be a supportive assistant to the people she is interacting with, that can take form of ANY NFT What makes your project unique? We worked on implementing a realistic voice that feels exactly like a person would talk, as well as long term memory that allows Evie to learn your writing patterns and learn from who you are. History of your project. After weeks of discussion, the idea of xGF was crystalized and launched on Ethereum mainnet on June 29, 2023 with 10 billion XGF tokens created at genesis. Whatâ€™s next for your project? xGF is currently working on boarding mainstream NFT collections and brining holders art to life. What can your token be used for? We run a hold2use model, by holding xGF you get access to our services. There are 4 access tiers; - Simp Tier (Audio only) - Hold 100,000 $XGF - Friend-Zone Tier (Audio only) - Hold 300,000 $XGF - Girlfriend Tier (Audio only) - Hold 500,000 $XGF - Video exclusive Tier (Video & Audio) - Hold 1,500,000 $XGF By using xGF you agree with our Terms of Services & Privacy Policy.
